title: Iniunctions gyuen by th [sic] auctoritie of the kynges highnes to the clergie of this his realme
author: Church of England.
publisher: Thomas Berthelet Regius impressor excudebat. Cum privilegio,
notes: Addressed to the Church of England.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.

An edition, with additions, of STC 10084.7. An added injunction requires provision of a Latin and an English Bible and encouragement of laymen to read them. The inner forme is in 2 settings; pi1v line 2 has "shall" (Cambridge University Library copy) or "shal" (Corpus Christi College (University of Cambridge). Library copy)--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
